title: "Bayesian Rating curve"

---
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(dev = 'pdf')
```

```{r echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(stargazer,quietly=TRUE)
```  
   
      
```{r echo=FALSE}
plotlist=model1()
a=exp(plotlist$mu[1])
b=plotlist$mu[2]
c_hat=min(plotlist$RC$w)-exp(plotlist$t_m[1,])
```

Formula of Rating curve: $$\ Q(W) = `r a` \cdot (W - `r c_hat` )^{ `r b`}$$

```{r results='asis',echo=FALSE}
stargazer(plotratingcurve()$tafla,type="latex",summary=FALSE, title=input$name,header=FALSE)
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
if(length(plotratingcurve())!=0)
    if(class(plotratingcurve()[[1]])[1]=="gg")
        plotratingcurve()[[1]]
```
